WindAnimation Class Reference

This class exposes a Vector4 to the effect file engine, which provides a wind animation value that can be used to blow texture coords around (in x,y) and also provides the current wind average speed (in z,w). More...

Detailed Description

This class exposes a Vector4 to the effect file engine, which provides a wind animation value that can be used to blow texture coords around (in x,y) and also provides the current wind average speed (in z,w).
